name: hotel 1
description: The Hotel Hesperia is the right choice for visitors who are searching for a combination of charm, peace and quiet, and a convenient position from which to explore Venice. It is a small, comfortable hotel, situated on the Canale di Cannaregio. The Derai family and their staff offer an attentive, personalized service and are always available to offer any help to guests.
